```{r}
myNSE <- function(func){
  function(input_list, ...){
    eval(
      substitute(func(...)), 
      input_list
    )  
  }
}

test_min <- myNSE(min)
test_min(list(a=c(4,5,6), b=c(512,23,1,1)), a)

test_print <- myNSE(print)
test_print(list(x = 'hmmmmm'), x, quote=TRUE)

data(iris)
lm(formula = Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width, iris)
test_lm <- myNSE(lm)
test_lm(iris, formula = Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width)

lm(formula = Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width - 1, iris)
test_lm(iris, formula = Sepal.Length~Sepal.Width - 1)

```
